entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
